subject: J2EE Tester / Developer
msgSnippet: Hi, I apologise if my mail is not of interest. We require experienced Tester/Developers to work on Contract with a large Bank in Frankfurt (initially for 6
messageBody:
Hi,

I apologise if my mail is not of interest.

We require experienced Tester/Developers to work on Contract with a
large Bank in Frankfurt (initially for 6 months).

To be considered you will need to be able to start at the beginning
of September and currently be eligible to work in Germany with about
5 years experience.

You will be an experienced JAVA/J2EE developer with a background of
Testing especially with the Unit Test family of applications: JUnit,
Cactus, HttpUnit.

Knowledge of Test methodologies such as TMap, XML, Cocoon, RUP, UML,
ANT, WebLogic all of benefit.

This is an English-speaking environment and you will need a high
standard of drafting ability in English.

Closing date for applications Friday 15th August 2003 13:00 GMT


If you are interested please make contact for further information.


Best regards,


Benjamin Corke
Senior Consultant
Cerebra Recruitment Ltd.
Tel: +44 (0) 1483 452022
Mailto:ben@...
